entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:58 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 02:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon except rain along the coast. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
